RECORD.TEXT: 884948991 91825/q468 RENAL CELL CARCINOMA . Unsigned Report Status : Unsigned ADMISSION DATE : 5/23/95 5/30/95 PRINCIPAL DIAGNOSIS : Renal cell carcinoma . Hypertension . Percocet . This 60 year old female presents with a mass in her right kidney and she was admitted a Same Day admit for right radical nephrectomy . This was carried out uneventfully , and pathology revealed a renal cell carcinoma . Electrolytes were 135 , 4.5 , chloride 101 , CO2 31 , hematocrit 34.8 . Preoperative evaluation revealed bone scan with no evidence of metastatic disease . She will be follow up as an outpatient after her discharge . NAMAIREGID SHUFF , M.D. 6/5/95 TD : CC :
